# Elevator Maintenance Services

## Call for Tenders

The Canadian Space Agency invites qualified service providers to submit bids for the procurement of complete elevator maintenance services at the David Florida Laboratory, located in Ottawa, Ontario. The services are required to be in accordance with the CSA B44-94 safety codes for elevators.

### Tender Overview

* Tender Reference Number: cb-361-77264010
* Amendment Number: 5
* Solicitation Number: 9F023-20230068-B
* Publication Date: 2023-10-03
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-10-24T14:00:00

### Contract Period

* The contract period is for a duration of one year from the date of contract award.
* The contract may be extended by up to four irrevocable options of one year each, allowing the Canadian Space Agency to extend the term of the contract.

### Work Location

* The work will be performed at the David Florida Laboratory, located at 3701 Carling Avenue, CP11490, Succ. H, Ottawa, Ontario, K2H 8S2.

### Requirements

* The services are required to be in accordance with the CSA B44-94 safety codes for elevators.
* The bidder is recommended to visit the work site prior to submitting their bid.

### Security Requirements

* There are no security requirements applicable to the contract.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

* The evaluation of bids will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Attachments

* Amendment - Amendment Number 1: 9f023-20230068-b---amendment---modification-1.pdf
* Annex: 9f023-20230068-b---annexa.pdf
* RFP: 9f023-20230068-b---rfp.pdf

You can find more information and the attached documents at [Canada Buys Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
